import React, { Component } from 'react' import { Form, Button, Input, Message, Checkbox } from 'semantic-ui-react' import Layout from '../components/Layout' import FileSaver from 'file-saver' import { network } from '../src/web3.js' import config from '../config.json' const CONFIG_FILE_PATH = './config.json' class Settings extends Component { state = { liquidatorAddress: config[network].liquidatorAddress, addressToLiquidate: config[network].addressToLiquidate, collateralAddress: config[network].collateralAddress, repayTokenAddress: config[network].repayTokenAddress, lpAddressProviderAddress: config[network].lpAddressProviderAddress, lpAddress: config[network].lpAddress, latestLpCoreAddress: config[network].latestLpCoreAddress, wss: config[network].wss, http: config[network].http, mnemonic: config[network].mnemonic, ethGasStationAPIKey: config[network].ethGasStationAPIKey, dynamicGasPrice: config[network].dynamicGasPrice, liquidationAmount: config[network].liquidationAmount, gasPrice: config[network].gasPrice, gasLimit: config[network].gasLimit, receiveATokens: config[network].receiveATokens, errorMessage: '', } onSubmit = (event) => { event.preventDefault() console.log(this.state) var configFile = { liquidatorAddress: this.state.liquidatorAddress, addressToLiquidate: this.state.addressToLiquidate, collateralAddress: this.state.collateralAddress, repayTokenAddress: this.state.repayTokenAddress, lpAddressProviderAddress: this.state.lpAddressProviderAddress, lpAddress: this.state.lpAddress, latestLpCoreAddress: this.state.latestLpCoreAddress, wss: this.state.wss, http: this.state.http, mnemonic: this.state.mnemonic, ethGasStationAPIKey: this.state.ethGasStationAPIKey, dynamicGasPrice: this.state.dynamicGasPrice, liquidationAmount: this.state.liquidationAmount, gasPrice: this.state.gasPrice, gasLimit: this.state.gasLimit, receiveATokens: this.state.receiveATokens, } var blob = new Blob([JSON.stringify(configFile)], { type: 'application/json', }) FileSaver.saveAs(blob, 'settings.json') } hiddenFileInput = React.createRef() uploadSettings = () => { this.hiddenFileInput.current.click() } readSettings = (event) => { var fileUploaded = event.target.files[0] var fr = new FileReader() fr.onload = (e) => { var result = JSON.parse(e.target.result) console.log(this.liquidatorAddress + 'RERERER') var formatted = JSON.stringify(result, null, 2) console.log(formatted) } fr.readAsText(fileUploaded) } render() { return (

This is the Settings Screen

this.setState({ liquidatorAddress: event.target.value }) } /> this.setState({ addressToLiquidate: event.target.value }) } /> this.setState({ collateralAddress: event.target.value }) } /> this.setState({ repayTokenAddress: event.target.value }) } /> this.setState({ lpAddressProviderAddress: event.target.value, }) } /> this.setState({ lpAddress: event.target.value }) } /> this.setState({ latestLpCoreAddress: event.target.value }) } /> this.setState({ wss: event.target.value })} /> this.setState({ http: event.target.value }) } /> this.setState({ mnemonic: event.target.value }) } /> this.setState({ liquidationAmount: event.target.value }) } /> this.setState({ gasLimit: event.target.value }) } /> this.setState({ ethGasStationAPIKey: event.target.value }) } /> this.setState({ gasPrice: event.target.value }) } /> this.setState(({ dynamicGasPrice }) => ({ dynamicGasPrice: !dynamicGasPrice, })) } /> this.setState(({ receiveATokens }) => ({ receiveATokens: !receiveATokens, })) } />
